package.name: MobileMeadow Reborn
package.shortDescription: Turn your phone into a meadow. Add flowers to your apps. Let birds fly on your screen.

changelog.change: MobileMeadow Reborn is the successor of the original MobileMeadow tweak, made by @pixelomer. It transforms your phone into a peaceful meadow, where vibrant flowers bloom across your apps and graceful birds soar freely over your screen. Let nature take over your digital world, bringing a sense of tranquility and beauty to every tap and swipe.
